items.sentence: I couldn\'t have done this without your help.
Why does everyone want one of those so badly?
I should\'ve listened to Tom instead of Mary.
I think Tom shouldn\'t stay at home tomorrow.
Tom has a lot of homework to do this evening.
Tom spent a sleepless night thinking of Mary.
I just want you to tell Tom what you told me.
I only have one picture of great-grandmother.
I shut the window to keep the mosquitoes out.
I\'m amazed at his rapid progress in English.
I\'m fortunate to have survived the accident.
I\'m looking for my keys. Have you seen them?
I\'m looking for my wallet. Have you seen it?
I\'m not going to do that unless you help me.
Tom didn\'t know why his car wouldn\'t start.
Tom didn\'t understand Mary\'s point of view.
I\'ll try to finish writing the report today.
I\'m afraid that something is wrong with Tom.
I\'m glad that Tom made it home in one piece.
You\'re the only one who volunteered to help.
You\'re upset and you have every right to be.
Tom doesn\'t like the way John looks at Mary.
Tom doesn\'t like to talk about his problems.
Tom doesn\'t like to talk about what he does.
Tom doesn\'t look like either of his parents.
Thank you for everything you\'ve done for me.
That house with the red roof is Tom\'s house.
Canadians don\'t usually do things like that.
What you don\'t want to do is make Tom angry.
What you\'re suggesting is simply ridiculous.
What\'s in this box could be worth a fortune.
Tom, what did you do to make your sister cry?
I have plenty of things to eat in the pantry.
I wanted Tom to come to Boston for Christmas.
I wanted Tom to find out where Mary had been.
I wanted Tom to give me more time to do that.
I wanted to ask you some questions about Tom.
I wanted to be the first to congratulate you.
I think you\'ve mistaken me for someone else.
I think you\'ve read too many romance novels.
You can find more information on our website.
You can stay here for a while if you want to.
Were you the one who told Tom not to do that?
What I want right now is a hot cup of coffee.
I already told you not to smoke in your room.
I am staying at the hotel for the time being.
I always get up at 6 o\'clock in the morning.
I always walk to school if it\'s not raining.
I just want you to know I don\'t believe you.
I knew that Tom wouldn\'t be able to help us.
